website_summaries.verdict: Though it doesn't offer anything beyond basics, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-S2100 is a decent AA-battery-powered entry-level compact.

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: As a point and shoot, this camera is has everything that one would need. Its small, takes good enough pictures and has the ability to be adjusted as necessary for more custom shots then "point and shoot" This is my second Sony camera, and I am impressed with the advancements Sony has just made in a couple years. I shopped around looking at reviews, and after checking out what seems like a hundred reviews I am glad I just picked the Sony. Camera snobs who are looking for some magick camera that is a $2k Nikon for a couple hundred bucks or less should review their subject matter. Orange is good because it is easily visible too.
customer_reviews.author: Omnius

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me this camera froze up after the 2nd day of use. I needed it to be a camera that I could just put in more AA batteries without having to use a charger. It accomplished that but froze up and I could not get it to take any other pictures after the 2nd day of use. It keeps showing a command of "turn the power off and on again". of which I have done that multiple times without any success of it becoming able to take more pictures... And the memory disc still has plenty of storage left.......So disappointed.....909 322 5739..If any one cares.....
customer_reviews.author: Party I.

customer_reviews.title: Digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera came in new condition. Nice, large LCD screen. Takes AA batteries, uses AA alkaline batteries fast, but they are very inexpensive to buy and I know I always have fresh batteries on hand (versus wondering if rechargeable battery is going to work). Manual came with camera. The camera takes 1-3 seconds after button press to get picture, a bit slow, but picture quality is tops. Great inexpensive camera for snapshots. I bought it used for around 50 bucks. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries daily
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a present and within months, the camera began to eat through batteries after only a few photos. I started taking the batteries out after each use, thinking that would help. NOPE. I changed battery brand. NOPE. I called Sony and they'd love to repair it (at a charge). NOPE. I do not recommend this camera due to the constant cost to replace batteries. I'll throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: dianetavegia

customer_reviews.title: supersony
customer_reviews.text: All technicalities aside, this is an amazing camera, particularly for basic snapshots. It operates with ease, takes terrific pictures and offers enough features for the casual user to enjoy picture taking under most circumstances. I enjoy the fact that it uses AA batteries instead of the more expensive and harder-to-find battery packs. I realize that this camera is a relatively unsophisticated digital, but for the price, it's all one can ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Simple I guess
customer_reviews.text: Simple camera but tries to be very smart. Smile detection is great if your subject stops and poses for you. If you want a spontaneous shot, the settings have to be changed. Goes thru batteries pretty quick. Good camera for the price. Note: you must buy an extra storage card or the camera only takes a couple of pictures, 4G will give you a 1000+ pictures
customer_reviews.author: T. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and very friendly camera
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my mother. I found it was a very-easy-to-use device and turns out it is indeed. My mother loved it. It takes beautifuls pics. The only think I didn't like is that even it records video, when you play it from the camera it does not have audio so you can't hear anything. Whe are still trying to figure it out if the video can be listened from a computer. To bad this function is not completed.
customer_reviews.author: Naruto

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera, just not dog proof!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my girlfriend as a gift. Great picture quality, easy to use. Nice easy to see screen. Unfortunately, the camera is not dog proof, as we found out when her dog decided to have it as a snack! The dog attack does not affect the score I gave it though :). It's worth the price, not an exceptional camera, but not lacking anywhere either.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Sony Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera only due to the fact I had to purchase it a second time, the old one broke. I find it so easy to operate and I have fun downloading my photo and sending to friends and family. I felt a little pricey but its worth it..
customer_reviews.author: lynette

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many Sony Cybershot cameras but this was the first that used AA batteries and used the Sony lens and not a Zeiss lens. It wasn't up to my standards but I gave it to a person who likes it and uses it. I ordered myself another Sony Cybershot and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: There was minor corrosion on battery terminal which initially caused the camera not to work but after manipulation of the batter
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered very fast. There was minor corrosion on battery terminal which initially caused the camera not to work but after manipulation of the batteries and minor cleaning of the terminals the camera worked great.
customer_reviews.author: l jess

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I had to purchase this item is.... I already had this camera, given as a gift, but silly me was taking picture in the rain and got the lens wet inside, and it would have cost me almost as much to have it repaired, plus all the hastle. So, being familiar with the camera, I repurchased it. Good camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price and all around a great little camera. It's serving me well and looks like it will hold up to a lot of use. Definitely do buy a big memory chip for it though. The internal memory is about enough for one photo.
customer_reviews.author: F.

customer_reviews.title: Takes Very Good Photos Even Close up
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about it is the battery door becomes loose after allot of use
customer_reviews.author: Walker O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur, so I can't speak to advanced settings -- though, I was able to figure out how to take photos of the full moon from my roof one night. I like that it takes regular AA batteries and, for simple photos, it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: moon goddess

customer_reviews.title: quality! user friendly
customer_reviews.text: quality! user friendly camera, i like the AA power feature , not to many buttons on camera -it makes it user friendly, you only need to push the button after the initial NEW CAMERA SET UP , and all pics are excellent , oh, and is a SONY
customer_reviews.author: gabe

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera purchased it for my mother-in-law who is a camera buff, easy to use and great pictures andshe can plug it into compuetr to share photos
customer_reviews.author: roberta lange

customer_reviews.title: This camera accepts both MS Pro Duo and SD memory ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera accepts both MS Pro Duo and SD memory sticks and uses AA batteries. What more could you need?
customer_reviews.author: D. Stith

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very Satisfied with this camera. It takes good pictures, even though I tend to have a shaky hand. I can take short videos and switching the pics and videos from the camera onto my computer is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: HerMighty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I just love it, especially because of the support of sd cards, my older cybershot only have support for M2 cards. The only detail is that doesn't bring a rechargeable battery but well, I have a par of those in my house, so I don't have trouble whit that...
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rivas

customer_reviews.title: kinda works
customer_reviews.text: Camera works OK, however, when first turned on ,and the lens extends,the lens cover will not open unless the lens is "tapped". Seems to work ok after that until it is powered off, then when turn ON the lens cover again sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: sony digital camera
customer_reviews.text: my teenage daughter took this to college with her... she loves this camera... takes great pictures and is very easy to use.... the only thing she wishes it had a rechargeable battery...but the batteries last a long time...... LOVES SONY
customer_reviews.author: Clown teacher

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a silver camera for me and then ordered this orange one for a friend thinking she might take my silver one and i could have the orange. wrong she liked the orange one better. this is a great product and showed up just in time for her birthday
customer_reviews.author: kansas

customer_reviews.title: Good and simple
customer_reviews.text: The camera is really easy to use for us who like to take pictures of a journey and don't have much photography experience. The downside is that it consumes a lot of battery on automatic mode and it can become really slow after a few shots, but is not a surprise considering it is made for amateurs and tries its best to take beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia_GV

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a simple camera to use and takes good picturesque and videos. I am happy with the camera and so is my wife. We received it, and used it the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Rozonkiewiecz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good Camera' have two of them this one was sent as a gift to a friend....
customer_reviews.author: itsme24u2

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: The camera is easy to use. It takes 2 AA batteries to run on. Comes with USB cord. Stores alot of photos and takes clear pictures. The shutter time takes a bit long, but my pictures turn out just as good as people with the 200$ ones- so I'm happy. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Conservachick

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Had an old Cybershot about 4 years ago and was happy with it until it was stolen. Saw this one and thought for the price it was worth a try. Very surprised by the picture quality. No blurriness to the picture even when the target or camera is moving. Obviously not using it for professional photography but for trips and just every day picture taking and printing photos I would highly recommend it especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jones2cg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a gift for my wife. It is very easy to use and takes nice pictures. This camera is for the non-technical person who just wants a good quality camera that takes very good quality pictures. Simple to use and nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, worked great, good price! Easy to use. Pictures came out great
customer_reviews.author: dalec

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price !!
customer_reviews.text: For 86.99 I won't get better one,small,attractive new color,easy to use and good quality photos. I got it for my child and we both love it,not a waste of bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Doctor

customer_reviews.title: battery consumer
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding at taking photos 12.1 megapixels work great. Its super easy to use and is very stylish, the only downside of this product would be the amount of battery this camera uses. If I take this to a family event, or even just out to take pictures of the city I have to have spare batteries on me all the time, besides that this is a great camera
customer_reviews.author: dhruv

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Sony DSC-S2100 has large 3.0 inch screen, nice optical zoom, great battery life. Would recommend to anyone looking for a quality digital camera!
customer_reviews.author: BocaGuySoFLA

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-S2100 Digital Camera with Steady Shot Image
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Sony DSC-S2100 12 IMP Digital Camera with 3X optical Zoom and liked the price with all the great options, but after only using the camera maybe four times, I now have a problems with the camera not working properly. I called Amazon and they kindly told me that they would replace it for me. Gee It was so nice to hear that since with the holiday seasons are right around the corner and the camera is greatly needed.........
customer_reviews.author: natalie83

customer_reviews.title: un zoom able
customer_reviews.text: there was no mode for taking really close up images like the samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Betty C. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera that uses AA batteries
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I had broken, so there was no learning curve. Great little camera, very portable, so I Always carry it, and it uses regular AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have owned many digital cameras and find this the best one we have ever owned. Apparently it's a new generation. It is so automatic it makes it really easy to use. It automatically detects the photo type you are taking and lets you know - scenery, cuisine, closeup, etc. The smile feature is fun. Face detection with exposure correction really works. It's compact, boots up quickly and has little or no delay when taking a picture. The 12MB picture really captures detail. We love this camera but may buy another brand for my wife when the time comes just because I like to experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good pics.
customer_reviews.text: I had the DSC-P92 for year. The menus are nearly the same. The picture brightness varies with pixel choice though. No touchscreen or lithium batteries - less for me to break. Small enough and light enough. Not much zoom, but high pixels (~4.5MB file for 12MP).
customer_reviews.author: E. Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Snapshot Warrior
customer_reviews.text: It's a Sony...through and through. Bought for my 14 year old son...4th digital camera I've bought in 10 years. Good resolution...great cycle speed. Sturdy construction. Great "snapshot" camera...rugged to deal with a 14 year old beating!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-S2100
customer_reviews.text: Exellent point and shoot compact digital camera with 3x optical zoom and image stabilizer which creates good picture qualitity for everyday use. Could be made a little smaller and prettier, but for the price just under $100, it is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not easy to adjust settings
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice camera, however settings are very complicated, and is not easy to take macro shots, since there is not a direct macro button, nice pictures, another issue is that even if you bring down the resolution of the pictures the photos are very big in size on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: MARIO RIBA

customer_reviews.title: Digital Camera for Dummies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my mom who had never had a digital camera of her own - she was still using a 35mm with film....it is easy to use, small enough to take with you anywhere, and takes great pictures! It's great!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: this camera is very good, because the image is excellent, the anti wave is very good, too, the only bad i dont like is the batery, its necesary buy batery, its the only bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonattan Paniagua

customer_reviews.title: Some missing items
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the package did not include the memory card, the memory card USB adapter, or the camera to computer cable. Other than these deficiencies, the camera has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Image quality was surprisingly very BAD. I was surprised, coming from a Sony camera. It was actually worse than my 2 year old Cybershot 7.2 pixels. However video quality was actually good. But since photos are the main purpose of a camera, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Fabo Camo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera so I would have something for those "get it now" pics. I'm so happy with this SONY! fits the need AND does so much more. This is the perfect point and shoot camera. Great rear view screen. Easy to use control buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good for portability. Image quality is not the best, but at less than $100 can't expect much. No rechargeable battery! Batteries drain extremely quick due to the size of the LCD.
customer_reviews.author: The Undisgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in Sept 2011 for ~ $85. Has worked without problems in rain and snow. Only drawback is that the 3x zoom not as good as I needed. Overall a good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter to replace one she had damaged the screen on. She loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Charles Shafer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Has all the bells and whistles that my father-in-law needed. He loves it and uses it all the time. I would definitely recommend it for all age groups.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Galpin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - while it worked...
customer_reviews.text: This camera was wonderful but at 10 months, the lens just closed down on its own any time we turned it on. It is useless. Trying to contact SONY to get them to honor the warranty is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item good deal
customer_reviews.text: This stuff work really great and it is very easy to use. it came with all accessories only one thing, seller told that it included a battery charger andi did not find it in the box. Any way it was a good deal Thank Amazon and Game 4 less.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Enrique Berliza Yorro

customer_reviews.title: Digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used camera as a gift for my 8 year old grandson as his first camera. It was in perfect condition. A great bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom as a gift. Easy to use especially for her. Good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ghetto

customer_reviews.title: Super fast
customer_reviews.text: Received item super fast, and it was exactly what I wanted, takes excellent pictures, I had been looking for a camera a long time.
customer_reviews.author: 2legit2quit

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a sleek one
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you are a no-hassle camera lover. This is a no frill camera and gives you just what it promises. was impressed with the quick response .. takes a second to save a snap and get ready for the next click ..!!
customer_reviews.author: Partha

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-2100
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying using this camera. It was a little difficult at first but with patience I finally got it working. Thanks for your assistance
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Works as a Camera but dont expect frills!
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera for the price but the images are extremely white. grainy images on the LCD. Great to receive as a gift, not so great to actually PAY for.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: sony camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the one that was dropped.Sony is a very good product.Great price!
customer_reviews.author: allan

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: i do not like it, the image is not good and you waast a lot of bateries. wast of money.not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: a user-friendly camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera!. It is very user-friendly. If you do not have any expectation more than easily taking photo with high quality, this camera will be your best.
customer_reviews.author: Fatih Cengiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of experience with digital cameras, but I think this one is a winner. I borrowed an earlier model Sony last year that cost way more, and this is better. Nice little camera, good features, easy to use, and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: M.E. in L.A.

customer_reviews.title: no internal speaker
customer_reviews.text: Note that the camera does NOT have internal speaker. Kind of annoying that sony left this out. Captures video but playback on the camera is muted. Otherwise a good camera. Smile shutter works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: C2100

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I thought this camera was 12 mp my old sony of 4mp takes better pictures, all of them are blurry no matter what the options are. The flash seems to be too bright and all the pictures with flash look high contrast, it doesnt have good focus and it is not good for landscapes, the resolution is terrible, it is 4000x3000 of blurry pixels.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: product defective after 3rd use.
customer_reviews.text: Shutter wouldn't close anymore after 3rd use. So couldn't take camera anywhere to prevent lens from getting scratched/damaged.
customer_reviews.author: buyer111

customer_reviews.title: missing accesories
customer_reviews.text: nice camera but requires purchase of a card to store pictures and a card reader to download pictures
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is ok, but I get blurry shots for no reason sometimes and the fact that it doesn't take rechargeable batteries is a disappointment. I had no idea when I bought this that it didn't have or accept rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: B. Matuza

customer_reviews.title: NOT A COMPLETE ITEM.
customer_reviews.text: This item does not include memory or a carring case. So the value is not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcial Cordova

product_meta.title: Sony DSC-S2100 12.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackA large 3.0” LCD makes taking and viewing pictures easy with the DSC-S2100. With 12MP resolution and 3x zoom great shots can be taken from greater distances plus enjoy the convenience of AA battery operation. Features including Easy mode, iAuto and SteadyShot™ make it easy to capture great images in various conditions.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


A large 3.0-inch LCD makes taking and viewing pictures easy with the Cyber-shot DSC-S2100. With 12-megapixel resolution and 3x zoom, great shots can be taken from greater distances plus enjoy the convenience of AA battery operation. Features including Easy mode, iAuto and SteadyShot make it easy to capture great images in various conditions. 

Sony DSC-2100 Highlights 

12.1-megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor
A powerful 12.1-megapixel, 1/2.3-inch Super HAD CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 12.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19-inch) size, or crop your images and still come away with high resolution shots. 



3.0-inch Clear Photo LCD display (230k pixels)
Generous 3.0-inch (230K pixels) Clear Photo LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight. 

Intelligent Auto Mode
Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, faces, and adjusts settings resulting clear images, faces with natural skin tone and less blur. Take advantage of all the technology without leaving Auto mode. Take a picture from a kid on the playground, to landscape shots, to a beautiful flower or an indoor birthday party. All clear images without leaving auto mode. 

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode
Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects nine different types of scenes and, within just 1/30th of a second, selects the appropriate camera settings: Backlight, Backlight Portrait, Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Portrait, Landscape and Macro. 

Steady Shot Image Stabilization
SteadyShot image stabilization compensates for camera shake and helps prevent blur by capturing two photos at high shutter speeds and combining them into a single clear image. 

High Sensitivity Mode (ISO 3200)
High ISO allows for faster shutter speed, so you can take photos indoors or in low light without the need for a flash. In addition to High Sensitivity Mode (ISO), you can select up to seven ISO settings (Auto, 100, 200, 400, 800, 1600, 3200) when shooting in Program Auto Mode to adjust sensitivity to your shooting conditions. 

Face Detection technology
Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and flash to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends. 

Smile Shutter helps capture the best possible shot Smile Shutter technology
Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 

Scene Modes
The DSC-S2100 features 8 convenient scene modes: High Sensitivity, Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Soft Snap, Landscape, Beach, Snow, Gourmet. 

Easy Shooting Mode
With Easy Shooting Mode, even beginners can take great photos. In Easy Shooting Mode, easy-to-understand basic instructions are displayed on the LCD screen and the camera switches to all automatic settings, removing several function choices and allowing you to focus on just your subject. Since this mode works together with Intelligent Scene Recognition, the camera selects the optimum setting for each scene. In addition the easy mode simplifies preview mode. 

In-Camera Retouching Tools
Retouch and enhance your photos on the go with in-camera Trimming and Red-Eye Correction functions 
In-camera retouching options 
AA Battery
Operates on AA batteries for convenient and affordable replacement. 

Card Slot
Card slot for optional Memory Stick Duo media. 

SD Card Functionality
Sony SD memory cards are the perfect solution for storing and sharing your digital content such as high-quality photos, videos, music, and more. 

Includes Sony PMB (Picture Motion Browser) Software ver. 5.02
Sony Picture Motion Browser software offers a simple, intuitive way to transfer, sort, and view your video and still images on your compatible PC. In addition, multiple output options let you burn your memories to DVD (sold separately), as well as take advantage of one click upload to a number of popular video and photo sharing sites 

Includes Sony PMBP (Picture Motion Browser Portable) software
With the pre-installed Picture Motion Browser (PMB) Portable software the DSC-S2100 makes it easy to pre-select videos and images in the camera and conveniently upload them from the camera to a compatible PC and popular Internet sharing sites without the need for any additional software or install.
feature_bullets: 12.1-megapixel resolution, 3x zoom lens, 3.0-inch LCD screen (230K pixels)
Convenient AA battery operation and memory card slot for convenient replacement
Easy Shooting Mode simplifies camera operation; SteadyShot image stabilization helps prevent blur
Card slot for optional Memory Stick Duo media and SD media

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
